duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage prospects through proactive outreach for debt consolidation solutions.
Analyze customer’s financial situations and offer debt resolution solutions.
Collaborate with cross-departmental teams to provide exceptional service to customers.
Strive for excellence and achieve or exceed daily metrics and monthly targets.
Ensure all sales transactions adhere to compliance standards.
Build rapport and establish trust with prospective clients.
Manage CRM pipeline and schedule to maximize individual opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in any field (Sales or Business preferred)
